lead_paragraph: A plan by Indonesia's next leader to hike fuel prices this year faces opposition within his coalition, party officials said, stirring concern whether he will have the political support to take such a contentious step during his first weeks in office.

headline.main: Indonesia's Next Leader, Widodo, Faces Party Divided Over Fuel Subsidies
headline.print_headline: Indonesia's Next Leader, Widodo, Faces Party Divided Over Fuel Subsidies
